item.title: UK Official Holdings of International Reserves - December 2009 CHANGED
item.description: CHANGED Monthly breakdown for government's net reserves, detailing gross reserves and gross liabilities.
item.hub:nscl: Economy;Government Receipts and Expenditure;Public Sector Finance;Economy;Government Receipts and Expenditure;Public Sector Finance

item.title: Cereals and Oilseeds Production Harvest - UK 2009 Final Results
item.description: Presents estimates of the size of the UK cereals and oilseed rape harvest.
item.hub:nscl: Agriculture and Environment;Agriculture;Farm Outputs;Agriculture and Environment;Agriculture;Farm Outputs

item.title: End of custody licence release and recalls - November 2009
item.description:
Monthly statistical release on the numbers released from prison on end of custody licence and offenders recalled back to prison during the end of custody licence period.
The publication contains details on releases by offence group, sentence length, age, ethnic group and establishment, and recalls by reason for recall.
item.hub:designation: Official Statistics not designated as National Statistics
item.hub:ipsv: Public order, justice and rights;Justice system;Prisons;Public order, justice and rights;Justice system;Prisons
item.hub:altTitle: End of custody licence release and recalls

item.title: Sentencing Statistics Brief, England and Wales - April to June 2009
item.description: Quarterly statistical release on high level trends in court sentencing. Quarterly trends on indictable offences are presented for magistrates' courts and the Crown Court for various sub groups based on gender, age and type of disposal.
item.hub:designation: Official Statistics not designated as National Statistics
item.hub:ipsv: Public order, justice and rights;Justice system;Sentencing;Public order, justice and rights;Justice system;Sentencing

item.title: Population in custody, England and Wales - December 2009
item.description: Presents data on the population in custody with summary figures on the population in prison establishments, police cells, secure children's homes and secure training centres.
item.hub:designation: Official Statistics not designated as National Statistics

item.title: Probation statistics brief - July - September 2009
item.description:
Quarterly statistical release on the use of community sentences, including monitoring the impact of the new community sentences introduced under the Criminal Justice Act 2003.
The publication also contains information on offenders being supervised pre- or post- release from custodial sentence, and on the number of court reports written by the Probation Service
item.hub:designation: Official Statistics not designated as National Statistics
item.hub:ipsv: Public order, justice and rights;Justice system;Probation;Probation service;Public order, justice and rights;Justice system;Probation;Probation service
